Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
INSTRUCTIONS: This scale is made up of a list of statements each of which may or may not be true about you. For each statement check "definitely true" if you are sure it is true about you and "probably true" if you think it is true but are not absolutely certain. Similarly, you should check "definitely false" if you are sure the statement is false and "probably false" is you think it is false but are not absolutely certain.
SCORING: Please note that reverse scoring has been implemented for certain questions within this instrument. Items 3, 6, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 17, 24, 25, 27, 28, 29, 30, 34, 35, 36, 39, and 40 are reverse scored.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. There are several people that I trust to help solve my problems.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 2. If I needed help fixing an appliance or repairing my car, there is someone who would help me.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Most of my friends are more interesting than I am.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 4. There is someone who takes pride in my accomplishments.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 5. When I feel lonely, there are several people I can talk to.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 6. There is no one that I feel comfortable to talking about intimate personal problems.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

ElementEnum.RawValue:

2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 9. If I needed a ride to the airport very early in the morning, I would have a hard time finding someone to take me.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 10. I feel like I'm not always included by my circle of friends.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 12. There are several different people I enjoy spending time with.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 13. I think that my friends feel that I'm not very good at helping them solve their problems.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 14. If I were sick and needed someone (friend, family member, or acquaintance) to take me to the doctor, I would have trouble finding someone.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 15. If I wanted to go on a trip for a day (e.g., to the mountains, beach, or country), I would have a hard time finding someone to go with me.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 16. If I needed a place to stay for a week because of an emergency (for example, water or electricity out in my apartment or house), I could easily find someone who would put me up.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 17. I feel that there is no one I can share my most private worries and fears with.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)
1, probably true (2) 2, probably false (1)

Field.ElementLabel: 18. If I were sick, I could easily find someone to help me with my daily chores.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)
2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

3, definitely true (3) 0, definitely false (0)

2, probably true (2) 1, probably false (1)

0, definitely true (3) 3, definitely false (0)

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
Scoring:
Items 3, 6, 9, 10, 11, 13, 14, 15, 17, 24, 25, 27, 28, 29, 30, 34, 35, 36, 39, and 40 are reverse scored.
Items 1, 6, 11, 17, 19, 22, 26, 30, 36, and 38 make up the Appraisal Support Subscale
Items 2, 9, 14, 16, 18, 23, 29, 33, 35, and 39 make up the Tangible Support Subscale
Items 3, 4, 8, 13, 20, 24, 28, 32, 37, and 40 make up the Self-Esteem Support Subscale
Items 5, 7, 10, 12, 15, 21, 25, 27, 31, and 34 make up the Belonging Support Subscale.
All scores are kept continuous.
Field.ElementLabel: Appraisal Support Subscale

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([isel_scr_1],[isel_scr_6],[isel_scr_11],[isel_scr_17],[isel_scr_19],[isel_scr_22],[isel_scr_26],[isel_scr_30],[isel_scr_36],[isel_scr_38])

Field.ElementLabel: Tangible Support Subscale

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([isel_scr_2],[isel_scr_9],[isel_scr_14],[isel_scr_16],[isel_scr_18],[isel_scr_23],[isel_scr_29],[isel_scr_33],[isel_scr_35],[isel_scr_39])

Field.ElementLabel: Self-Esteem Support Subscale

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([isel_scr_3],[isel_scr_4],[isel_scr_8],[isel_scr_13],[isel_scr_20],[isel_scr_24],[isel_scr_28],[isel_scr_32],[isel_scr_37],[isel_scr_40])

Field.ElementLabel: Belonging Support Subscale

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([isel_scr_5],[isel_scr_7],[isel_scr_10],[isel_scr_12],[isel_scr_15],[isel_scr_21],[isel_scr_25],[isel_scr_27],[isel_scr_31],[isel_scr_34])
